manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What benefits can the detachable handle cookware set bring to you? 70% Space-saving: Perfect stacking of set in storage compartment like drawers, cabinets, RV, camping use, travel trailer, motorhome. Effortlessly Move: Removable handle for the ultimate versatility– go from ALL kinds of stoves to the oven, grill, fridge and on the dinner table.

Clean with a 5s wipe Fuss-free Cleaning! Easy to clean pans and pots finished with an enhanced nonstick exterior make cleanup easy and with zero elbow grease. Using neutral detergent is recommended while cleaning. Non-stick Pans and Pots Effortless Cooking in the Detachable Cookware Sets! With 10x ultra peeling-resistance nonstick surface, this detachable cookware set marries breath-taking design with the latest in non-stick advances. Even the simplest recipes get the star treatment with Carote's unique "Click" cookware set.

Space Saving Versatile Cooking Made Simple and Safe in A Click! NO MORE CABINET CHAOS: 70% Space-saving magic, keep your kitchen tidy and clutter-free! BEST TRAVEL COMPANION: Compact-sized rv cookware set, saving you valuable space. From stove, to oven, to table, fridge, or dishwasher, Carote's removable handle cookware set is the smart answer to being a multi-purpose cookware. Oven safe up to 480 ℉. All stoves compatible Rapid&Even Heat Transfer! Nonstick cookware set maximizes heat transfer and distribution to help the home cook achieve professional searing and browning results while reducing energy usage. The induction-ready base with magnetic core allows you to use all in one plus pan on any cooktop.
Previous page Next page 1 Versatile Stoves Use 2 Quick Serving 3 Safe Oven Use 4 Easy Food Storage

All-in-one Set Tips: 1. The knob of the 10'' lid is packed in the package of 8'' silicone lid. 2. We'd recommend detaching the handle while cooking with open flames to extend the lifespan of the handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very light and perfect
reviews.reviewText: Love that there are no 10 lids ,love that I can put them in the fridge and they don't take lots of space,love that I can put them in the oven for baking, love the 2 handles , love the color( i got the white) , love that they are so light and nothing sticks when you cook .Absolutely nothing that I don't like.This is the best purchase I have made on amazon so far.So easy to wash , so light and very prettyI took all my other pots and pans to Goodwill and this is all I need in my kitchen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute set, got this as a gift for my mom. She's in love with it! The pans and pots come with detachable handles that make storage a dream! It's soo nice that they're space friendly! It came with pot/pan protective pads that you put inside them so you can stack them in your storage without scratching them! That was a nice touch. And they are nonstick so cleaning them is super easy. Overall great gift worth every penny she cooks me amazing food in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Look, I have spent literally thousands of dollars on cookware - I LOVE to cook!!! Until now, I have never really been satisfied with a cookware set. Not only is this set beautiful to look at, it is easy to cook with, easy to clean and easy to stack neatly away. I love that I can remove the handles for easy stacking and cleaning. I Love that I can go from stove top to oven, to fridge to microwave. I donated my other cookware. This one is a KEEPER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 6 months is use
reviews.reviewText: I “love” when ppl post reviews of functional items on the day they receive the item. Are you reviewing successful delivery?? Have you USED the item in its full meant capacity?No? “It just looks cute you guys!!”….ok,no thanks. If it’s a static item such as candle holder or a vase which whole purpose is to stand there and “look cute” then sure,why not,but pots and pans? Common now :)Let’s get back on track,I’ve purchased this set in August of 2023 and HAVE used it quite a bit. Durability, efficiency, reliability and quality. The set is very affordable for those who are looking to invest into “decent” pots and not break the bank. For those who care to match it to your kitchen,then yes,it IS very estatic and doesn’t make you hate your life every time you throw spaghetti in it. I can’t say that I’ve used it “properly” 100%,there’s been a few times where I’ve used a fork to turn a pancake over and OH MY GOSH of course I scratched the surface. Which is….okay. Because it’s not meant to be used with metal forks and spoons and the packaging says so,so I am not taking any points off for that. The handles are very sturdy and even though,6 months later I am still feeling uneasy to pick it up just by the handle alone if it’s full of boiling water thinking it will somehow unclip and burn my so many times sunburnt legs again…it never happened and yes I have carried a full pot of boiling water ACROSS my kitchen and waltzed back with it to the stove. Bottom line-the handles are GOOD and reliable. They are extremely easy to clean,by hand or dishwasher,so why 4 stars you might wonder…Ahhhhh,well…they ARE easy to clean INSIDE…BUT,the bottom of the pans for some weird reason have this black grease on it that wouldn’t come off for the life of me and oh I tried to get it off! BELIEVE me I’ve tried! For those who made it this far,pictures would perfectly relay to you what exactly I mean by black grease,or whatever that stuff is..scrub it,wash it,nothing gets rid of it. Is it a dealbreaker??No,not for me,but it’s nice to let y'all know in case you’ve experienced that before with other cookware and have this in your cart already :) Overall,decent set and quality matches the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking, space saving set!
reviews.reviewText: I loved these the moment I saw the size of the box they came in! Normally, this kind of set comes in a box that is at least twice the size.This little set fits in a tiny box and is actually very light as well. The packaging was done very well with plenty of protecting material in between. The handles fit onto the pans pretty securely with a very slight wiggle that isn't really a big deal. Time will tell how they hold up. The glass covers actually look very nice and form a great seal on every single pot and pan, leaving room to vent. The plastic covers that come with the set are good for just basic covering, but do not fit on to any of the pots or pans airtight.So far the performance of the one pan I have used is awesome. The non-stick coating is great at the onset and hopefully will continue to stay as strong as it is now. They actually seem to heat up pretty quickly and are easy to wash, especially since you can remove the handle completely for washing. My range is electric so I'm not worried about the handle burning, but I can see that being an issue with a flame on high.I am loving the very little space that they take in my cupboard. Great buy! Wish I had bought these while I was living in my RV and needed space for dishes and pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE amazing and i've tried EVERYTHING!
reviews.reviewText: Hubby loved the handle idea and wanted to try and i needed nonstick. They STACK in a small space so that saves, so i bought one for my daughter and her husband said it was absolutely PERFECT! A friend boasted she LOVES them in her cabin and got excited to hear we got our first set. The handle works more like your hands so you take it off when you remove your hand, which can be annoying if you're trying to stir things in a frypan but i've served food in these also, stored it, NONSTICK FOR EGGSS though i do use a little butter. One issue may be that it's hard to get greasy residue off and you have to use a sponge without texture. SLIPPERY WHEN WET for sure but I've cooked many things and still nonstick.

I bought these for our travel trailer but have been using them in the house until the summer camping season. They are very well made and take up very little space because they nest nicely. I was surprised that nothing sticks and food cooks quickly and evenly. They are easy to clean too. I was worried about the cream colour but they come very clean. I am thinking about buying it again for my everyday cooking too
Me encantan! Además de ser super baratas, son elegantes, el mango agarra super bien, llevo un mes con ellas y sin temas.
Po jednym myciu materiał wypełniający dół garnków zaczął się zmywać i zostawiać wszędzie szary pył. Zasłonki do garnków są z plastiku i nie można ich myć w zmywarce bo się wygną lol. Rączki są fajne.

reviews.reviewTitle: Le pentole che cercavo da sempre
reviews.reviewText: Innanzitutto le ho usate tutte, bianche sono bellissime, si scaldano velocemente con l’induzione e hanno un’antiaderenza ottima. Non potete immaginare la praticità dei manici, fenomenali, inserite una dentro l’altra stanno in pochissimo spazio. Super consigliabili

The media could not be loaded. Después de leer todas las reseñas negativas me dio un poco de miedo comprarlos PERO presumo que la gente que no le resultaron simplemente tienen cocinas muy fuertes y por eso los han quemado o manchado.En el vídeo se ve un huevo revuelto con tomate, no se pega nada y calientan muy uniforme la superficie.Tenemos cocina inducción y calientan súper rápido. Tenemos cuidado de remojar después de usarlos y los lavamos en lavavajillas sin problema, están perfectos.El mango es súper cómodo de poner y sacar, y de limpiar.Son muy ligeros, parece q son de juguete, pero va súper bien si tienes que verter contenido en algún sitio porque no pesa tanto todo junto y te las arreglas bien con una sola mano.Leer bien las instrucciones de cuidado antes de usarlo y listo! Estamos muy contentos con la compra.
